AppPush.Title: [EN] Repair Feature Unavailability - Genshin Impact 5.5
AppPush.Message:
Hi Travelers!
HoYoVerse has done some changes to their repair system, which resulted in the unavailability of the repair feature for Genshin Impact 5.5 in Collapse.
While we have resolved the issue for pre-downloads, repair still requires a launcher patch, which is underway and should be released shortly.

In the meantime, we ask you to refrain from using the Game File Clean-up feature.

We apologize for the inconvenience that this may have caused.

RegionPush.Title: [EN] Notice about Pre-Download Availability
RegionPush.Message:
Hi Travelers!
HoYoVerse has done some changes to the pre-download system, which resulted in the removal of ZIP archive for pre-download.
We have pushed an update to fix this issue, you should update your launcher to 1.82.22 to get the fix.
We are sorry for the inconvenience that this may have caused.

RegionPush.Title: [EN] Notice Regarding Sophon Pre-load/Update Issues
RegionPush.Message:
Hi Proxy!
We have acknowleged some issues might occur while you perform Pre-load or Update due to changes on the Sophon versioning.

A fix is underway and if you happen to have the fix ASAP, please download a test build from our Official Discord Server below. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
